ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.2.0 on 2024-11-30T20:44:43 [Issue ID 4000-105196] urn:comicvine:4000-105196
ComicInfo.Penciller: Antonio Conversano,Ed Coutts,Maximilian T. Plissken,Scott Nemmers,Silvano
ComicInfo.Summary: Special Halloween Horror Issue!!! ALL NEW!!! NOT A SINGLE REPRINT!! Yes, this issue is AC's spooky holiday greeting to you; and believe me, it's horrifying. Start off with a bizarre, dreamlike retro tale involving the FF team of some years ago, whose time spent captive in an abandoned movie theater teaches them that "Fear Is The Mind-Killer". Written by newcomer Ellis Lange, with art by Scott Nemmers. Then, Tara Fremont tracks a missing animal to the South China Sea, and learns "The Legend of the White Tiger", written by Enrico Teodorami and Paul Monsky, with art by Silvano and Maximillian Plissken. Finally, a terrifying tale of the living dead set in the rough and tumble Olde West, in "Five Graves For Black Phantom", written by Enrico Teodorani, with art by Antonoio Conversano. Plus, an illustrated gallery of the FF as Distressed Damsels, by cover artist Ed Coutts, and pin-ups by Nick Mikesell, Drew Gardener, Silvano, Bill Marimon and Luciano Bernasconi. 44 pages, black and white with color covers, standard comic book size.
ComicInfo.Title: The Legend of the White Tiger!; Five Graves for Black Phantom; Fear Is the Mind-Killer!
